data.actual_result: The empty category shows up and allows you to create notification overrides
data.expected_result: The empty category doesn't show up because it has no channels
data.short_description: Empty categories show up in notification overrides
data.steps_to_repro: - Create an empty category on a server - Go into notification settings on desktop and look at the available categories to create overrides for (optional to verify the category doesn't show) - Go into notification settings on iOS and view the available categories to create overrides for
